meanings.definition: Lacking hips or having a narrow hip structure.
meanings.sent1: The mannequin had a hipless appearance in the dress.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious in the hipless jeans.
meanings.sent3: The hipless mannequin tried to dance but couldn't sway.
meanings.sent4: Her hipless figure made her look like a delicate statue.
meanings.sent5: The hipless silhouette of the dress was elegant and sleek.

meanings.sent1: The hipless skeleton was displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The hipless creature moved with an unusual gait.
meanings.sent3: The hipless robot couldn't understand the concept of dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her hipless body seemed almost ethereal in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The hipless structure of the building gave it a futuristic look.
